ygData.subject: Re: Two of the same weapon
ygData.msgSnippet: Kinda, except Aradune (Bard) Can do anything he damn well wants, while JM can just spew usefull info at us degenerates ... From: Codo the Mysterious
ygData.messageBody:
Kinda, except Aradune (Bard) Can do anything he damn well wants, while JM
can just spew usefull info at us degenerates
